detail_desc: Padded coat in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a soft faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle on the flap, an inner pocket and a metal chain shoulder strap. Size 4x15x17 cm.

Long dress in chiffon with beaded and sequined embroidery. Round neckline, a covered button at the back of the neck and a loose yoke that leaves part of the back open. Concealed, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and short, raglan butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Partly lined.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Cable-knit front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with buttons down the front. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front for added width. Unlined.
Poncho top with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Sturdy bag in braided straw with two imitation leather handles at the top. Lined with a sewn-in drawstring bag in a cotton weave. Size 17x28x35 cm.
Hair elastic with a large bow.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with patch front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Shorts in a stretchy linen and cotton blend with a regular waist, zip fly and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the sides. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and short, narrow legs with short slits at the hems.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining.

Platform sandals with crossover foot straps in a jacquard weave and heel straps and ties that can be wound around the ankle. Heel and platform covered in a braided jute trim. Leather insoles and patterned soles. Platform front approx. 5 cm. Heel 8.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Trainers in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and front pockets. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a text print on the front. UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand or product.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Lined. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a smocked seam under the bust. Short puff sleeves with gathers and concealed elastication for a draped effect. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and sewn-in ties at the back of the waist. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, slim block heels, narrow foot straps and an ankle strap with concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Set with a dungaree dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey. Dress with elastication at the waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Hair clip made from recycled metal in the shape of a snake decorated with artificial pearls and sparkly stones. Size 7 cm.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, printed jersey. Top with a round neckline, short sleeves and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Lace bras with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back.
Boots in glossy imitation leather with reversible sequins, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with decorative studs and ribbed cuffs.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Over-the-knee socks in a soft pattern knit with ribbed tops.

Shorts in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist, detachable belt with a covered metal buckle and a fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners. Discreet pockets in the side seams and wide legs.
Cardigan in a soft cotton knit with long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Cable-knit hat with a faux fur pompom.
Patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hipster briefs in microfibre made from recycled polyamide. Lace trim at the top, a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back. Gusset lining in organic cotton jersey.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Short skirt in a woven viscose blend with embroidery on the front and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with studs around the neckline.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with ties and smocking at the cuffs.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar, covered buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jacket in a textured weave with fringe trims, front pockets with a press-stud and decorative chest pockets. No buttons. Lined.
Shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather with rows of fringing, a zip at the top and a narrow, braided shoulder strap. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Short, wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Plastic hair claws. Width 3.5 cm.
Kimono jacket in woven fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Shorter jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Sleeveless top in a lightweight cotton weave with elastication across the back and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps with broderie anglaise and overlocked scalloped edges. The shoulder straps join at the back with a decorative bow.

Cold shoulder jumpsuit in woven fabric with embroidered knots at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Opening with a button at the neck and wide, double-layered 3/4-length sleeves. Drawstring and seam at the waist, and tapered legs. Unlined.
Small plastic hair elastics.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and scalloped edges. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 5 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a concealed hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, deep side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Hairband in velour with decorative appliqués on the top and covered elastic at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Jersey pyjama top and woven shorts. Top with a chest pocket and shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif and text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.
Boxy-style T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
